div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2146 Sicily, 1879 Burial: c. 320-310 B.C. (K) Contents: 32 AR Leontini: 1 tetradr. Syracuse: 4 tetradr. (5th cent.) Siculo-Punic: 1 tetradr. (Syracusan types- Ziz or Rash Melcarth) Pegasi Corinth: 10 (Per. IV; Per. V with Ε, Α, ΑΛ, ΔΙ) Anactorium: 1 (tripod) Argos: 1 (javelin-listed as Ambracia) Dyrrhachium: 4 Leucas: 1 (stylis) Syracuse: 7 (incl. Agathoclean) Thyrrheium: 2 (rhyton) Disposition: Palermo Tusa Cutroni, AIIN 1956, p. 207, no. VII; † 1958-9, pp. 178-85
